org.deeplearning4j.nn.updater.graph

Class ComputationGraphUpdater.Aggregator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.nn.updater.graph.ComputationGraphUpdater.Aggregator

    Enclosing class:
    ComputationGraphUpdater

    public static class ComputationGraphUpdater.Aggregator
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Aggregator for combining ComputationGraphUpdater instances. Typically used in distributed training.
